website_summaries.verdict: Choose this urn if you want a tribute to your loved one that offers more than a plain finish, as the engraved birds in flight give it a peaceful effect.
pros: A sturdy, well-made metal urn that comes with smaller keepsake replica
Has detailed bird engravings with blue trim on a pewter finish
Bottom has felt lining, and lid fits securely
cons: Rare complaints of discoloration on the finish upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: THE BEAUTY OF THE URN
customer_reviews.text: When I receive my urn it was so amazing and exactly what we wanted. It is so beautiful and to know that my Love one ashes are in the urn, the only word that can complete this message is "PRICELESS"
customer_reviews.author: CBUNNYLOVINGITALL

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much . It was beautiful. The smaller urn was just what I needed. My mom services was great. 100 thank yous
customer_reviews.author: EBONEE

customer_reviews.title: My purchase arrived with no damage
customer_reviews.text: I used this as my sons final resting place . I wish the set of extra 4 urns were the same as the set with the big urn and the token as we have a few family members would like some of the ashes . We have not filled them, yet so I hope they sit evenly .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stiehl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stylish urns
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time as stated. They are beautiful and just what I wanted for my sons remains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice looking without being too much. Great deal with the extra urn too.
customer_reviews.author: Citi-Zen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful place for my wife to be.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice. Next one of those I want to get the ashes that go there.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how beautiful the urn set was, arrived quickly and packaged very well, however the mini urn arrived with a small chip at the base. Had we had time to return and wait for a new shipment I would have returned but with the time we had we used what we had.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda L Haas

customer_reviews.title: My wife will be with me forever when I pass
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was wanting , very pleased with my order. My wife passed away 2/27/2019. The necklace will go to her daughter. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Magness

customer_reviews.title: Lovely way to keep Mom’s ashes.
customer_reviews.text: The urn is beautiful and will be a secure way to keep our mom’s ashes. I used the mini-urn to take some of Mom’s ashes to sprinkle along the North Shore of Lake Superior on a recent trip. Thank you! Kay
customer_reviews.author: Kay Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was dead on! The product had some kind ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was dead on! The product had some kind of discoloration on it. Possibly from what ever was used to clean the etching?
customer_reviews.author: LMR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received this urn for my mother's ashes it was absolutely beautiful and I'm glad I made the decision to purchase from you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service great quality
customer_reviews.text: The urns are beautiful Exactly how they looked Very very satisfied. Excellent service
customer_reviews.author: Gatewy0052

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick even without Prime. Love the mini urn also. Yes I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant
customer_reviews.text: Urn looks just like the picture. Very elegant and sturdy. Birds look hand etched. Was easy to order and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: The craftsman ship and looks just like the picture. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the urn and the style. The birds give it flare. I used it for older brother that pass away 5yrs ago. So it came right on time. I got to put him in the urn 5yrs and 1 month of his passing. Thank you it means a lot to me to have my brother resting in something beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fontanez

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Felt very comfortable laying her ashes in this urn to rest
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Urn was very pretty. It was built solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: GABRIEL MEDRANO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Adult Urn
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful urn. Haven't had a chance to use yet. Traveling to South America with mother in-law ashes. It's size is perfect. Sure she would have approved.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn! I was happy to have my loved ones ashes placed in the urn good quality
customer_reviews.author: Yvetta jackson

customer_reviews.title: Urn
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. Exactly what I wanted and was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Iclarson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: The Urn was shipped quickly and is a beautiful product. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Cline

customer_reviews.title: Best purchased ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I’m so happy I made this purchased it’s so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Frog Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: So glad that you carried this urn. The funeral home wanted 300.00 for the same one
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Urns are beautifully designed & functional
customer_reviews.text: Urns were received very quickly & in great shape, & beautifully designed.
customer_reviews.author: lucille

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE THE URN!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE URN!! GAVE ME A PEACE OF MY MIND!!
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Cole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks, the picture is just as described. When arrived there was a good sized chip in the large urn which was very disappointing and no time to exchange but did contact seller who handled situation to satisfaction in a timely manner. Will have to deal with seeing the chip but it is very beautiful and just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product. But inside is really rough and the bird design could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The bird design needs more detail. It doesn’t have a beak and the head just blends into the body. The inside of the earn is really rough and craggy from being cast. I was a little disappointed when I looked inside. I hoped that it would at least be a little smoother for my father’s final resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect for my father in law's remains. The quality was great and we put him to rest with dignity. He would have loved the style. The lid screws on and it's a nice heavy metal. We took his ashes to Puerto Rico. We left the ashes in the original container from cremation until we got over there.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully crafted. It cost less than what the funeral home charges. And it came with a small keepsake. Such an amazing value
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smaller keepsake urn is defective
customer_reviews.text: The main urn is gorgeous and just what my family member was looking for. However, the smaller keepsake urn has a very loose lid. It does not thread correctly and feels likely to come apart. Considering returning it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous urn, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous urn for my Mom's ashes. Very sturdy, great craftsmanship at a great price! Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: AsianBeauty99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, exceptional quality. Thick heavy metal- Same as what the funeral homes offer but much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and my family is pleased with the urn.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome... exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome... exactly what I needed. The craftsmanship is amazing. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: 27tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memorial
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful memorial for families, beautiful and remarkably inexpensive. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Madcat Magick

customer_reviews.title: Value with beauty
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and pictured. Price was quite reasonable
customer_reviews.author: P E McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: It was every thing that I expected. It is a beautiful urn .
customer_reviews.author: Judi Bell

customer_reviews.title: very pretty urn
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, very affordable compared to the prices from funeral homes
customer_reviews.author: denise dickmeyer

product_meta.title: Wings of Love Cremation Urn Set - Large Wings of Freedom Urn with Free Keepsake - Returning Home Adult Urn - Handcrafted Affordable Urn for Human Ashes with Free Token & Velvet Bag
product_meta.description:
Divinityurn’s Arcadia Wings of Love CREMATION URN . The urn is made from solid metal and the perfect lacquer coat to preserve its brilliance. It comes with top opening with a threaded lid and felt bottom. The Engraved Bird finish with engraved bands are uniquely engraved by hand for each urn to show beautiful detail giving the FUNERAL URN a unique look to each finished product. Our urns are handcrafted uniquely by an ancient process called sand casting. This ADULT URN holds up to 210 cubic inch of cremains and approximate measure is that 1-pound weight prior to cremation equals 1 cubic inch after cremation . Dimensions: 10-inch-high x 8-inch diameter. All of our urns are in our warehouse and ready to ship as soon as payment is cleared. Usually we ship within one business day of receipt of payment. 

 100% Satisfaction Guarantee 

♦SATISFACTION→ We carry elegant and high quality products and we trust that you will be very happy with the quality and creative design of our products 

♦BEST PRICE GUARANTEE

♦EASY RETURN→ If you do not like the product after arrival please contact us by contact form and report the issue within 3 days after product arrival and we will refund your money after product is shipped back to us. But, once product is used we will not accept return due to the personal nature of this product
feature_bullets: This METAL CREMATION URN is a True Hand-crafted product ensuring each urn is UNIQUE, AFFORDABLE URN and DURABLE
This ADULT URN comes with top opening with a threaded lid and felt bottom
FUNERAL URN fits the remains of most adults weighing up to 210 lbs.
Color: Blue and Pewter, Dimensions: 8"L x 8"W x 11"H. Capacity 200 cubic inches
We have a unique selection of other Metal and BRASS CREMATION URNS in our store DIVINITYURNS
